definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Look at this cornicing. This is good work.
sentences.chinese: 瞧瞧这檐口，真是好手艺。

sentences.english: Her craftsmanship improved and she mastered her sketching techniques.
sentences.chinese: 她的手艺提高了，还熟练地掌握了草图素描法。

sentences.english: There were never more highly skilled workmen than those who lived in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 在古代中国有着众多的手艺高超的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: Conclusion Polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis technology can be used for seed identification of Andrographis paniculata seeds.
sentences.chinese: 结论聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳手艺可用于穿心莲种子剖断。

sentences.english: Zhao Junxin learned the craft of embroidering from his grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 赵俊信从奶奶那里学到了刺绣的手艺。

sentences.english: The Prince who had told Andersen to learn a useful trade was now the King.
sentences.chinese: 徒生去学一门手艺的王子此时已是国王了。

sentences.english: Eventually he saved enough money working at this trade on the side to buy his freedom.
sentences.chinese: 后来他终于靠这门手艺攒够钱赎回了自由。

sentences.english: The porcelain clay that you will use for your craft frogs will dry in a nice shade of white.
sentences.chinese: 瓷土，你会使用你的手艺青蛙干漂亮的白色阴影。

sentences.english: How can he in this strange and backward in technology?
sentences.chinese: 他怎么能在此道中手艺生疏而落后呢？

sentences.english: The craft has been passed down over five generations.
sentences.chinese: 这种手艺已经传了五代。
新创高温烘焙手艺烤粉腮红。

sentences.english: Some old folks are more skilled than younger people.
sentences.chinese: 有些老辈的手艺确实比现代人要精湛。

sentences.english: Hungry undead craftsmen all over the world, also just hungry undead.
sentences.chinese: 天下饿不死手艺人，也只是饿不死而已。

sentences.english: Here, for instance, I wanted to have my girls taught the trade of paper-box makers.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，我原想让我的两个女儿去学糊纸盒子的手艺。

sentences.english: A bpost workman quarrels with his tools.
sentences.chinese: 手艺差的工人总是挟恨工具不好使。

definition: hooped barrel/to handmake a wooden barrel
passed on from ancestors/handed down from generation to generation
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
